bio: I am a passionate software developer and a hardworking computer science student who is always eager to learn new techniques and improve my problem-solving skills. I have a strong desire to continuously improve and stay up-to-date with the latest advancement in the field. I am dedicated to my work and willing to go the extra mile to achieve my goals.

1.institute: Sir Syed University of Engineering and Technology

1.name: To do app
1.description: Simple note-taking application using flutter and firebase as a backend.

2.name: Covid-19 tracker
2.description: Covid-19 tracking applications that allow users to track all current status of covid-19 around the globe. The app retrieves real-time data from Rest API that provide information on the number of cases, deaths, and recoveries for each country affected by covid-19.

3.name: Chat application
3.description: A chatting application with a real time messaging. With the added convenience of Google Sign-In functionality, users can access the app securely and effortlessly. User will create a new group and send messages to each other in the group.

4.name: Calculator
4.description: A calculator app based on simple UI and a history section to show the previous calculations

5.name: Weather App
5.description: Weather application that allows users to update the current weather data. The app uses real-time data from Rest API. Users can also search other countries to show weather updates.

6.name: TikTok Clone
6.description: TikTok clone with the integration of camera feature.

7.name: Bankers Algorithm
7.description: It is a banker algorithm used to avoid deadlock and allocate resources safely to each process in the computer system. The 'S-State' examines all possible tests or activities before deciding whether the allocation should be allowed to each process. It also helps the operating system to successfully share the resources between all the processes.

8.name: Clock application
8.description: Digital and analog clock with the dark and light theme.

9.name: Login Sign-Up UI
9.description: Login and sign-up page UI with google authentication and forget screen.

10.name: Online Shopping
10.description: The online shopping terminal application using C++ and linked lists is a console-based application that allows users to shop for items from an online store. The app allows users to browse through a list of items available for sale and select the items they want to purchase. Using this app, users can add items to their shopping cart and view the total cost of their purchases. The application also allows users to remove items from their cart and update the number of items they want to purchase.

1.description: Solve problem-solving (basics). It covers basic topics of Data Structures (such as Arrays, Strings) and algorithms (such as sorting and searching).

2.description: I got an Scholarship from university in my academic career.
